name: 2Fighter
description:
Current Controls:

Player 1: w=up, a=left, s=down, d=right. j=weak attack, k=strong attack, l=special attack, u=block, i=grab, space = jump.

Player 2: t=up, f=left, g=down, h=right. ;=weak attack, '=strong attack, return=special attack, p=block, [=grab, / = jump.

Arrows will move both.
